Description: Genworth agreed to pay $1.9 million to settle multistate litigation regarding its use of the Social Security Administration's Death Master File.
Info Source: Another Multistate Settlement Reached in Death Mastercase; Genworth Agrees to Business Practice Reforms, States News Service, January 21, 2014 (via Nexis).

Company: Genworth Life and Annuity Insurance Co.
Genworth Life and Annuity Insurance Co.

Description: Genworth Mortgage Insurance Corp. agreed to pay a $90,000 civil penalty in settlement of allegations it engaged in Captive Mortgage Reinsurance Arrangements that did not pass a reasonable risk transfer test and the premium paid for the reinsurance exceeded its value, in violation of federal and state regulations.

Company: Genworth Life and Annuity Insurance Co.

Agency: New Jersey Department of Banking & Insurance
